price: 22. Et pourquoi n’adorerais-je pas Celui Qui m’a créé (sans modèle préalable) et vers Qui vous devez retourner ?
arabic: وَمَالِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā liya lā aʿbudu alladhī faṭaranī wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
